text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with the winning recipe from the
summer of you contest now of course it's
the summer of amina that's right amina
won and her request was a triple
chocolate chip and i was happy to oblige
because number one it's an easy recipe
and i also want to prove once and for
all you do not need an electric mixer to
make cookies so check it out okay one of
the secrets is make sure your butter is
very soft not melted but very very soft
to the butter i'm going to add white
sugar and brown sugar of course all the
amounts will be on the site and then
you're going to take a spatula and just
smoosh it together and you're going to
keep smashing it until it looks like
that it's going to take maybe two to
three minutes and that's it so far no
need for electric mixer once that's done
we are going to add one whole egg and
some vanilla about half a teaspoon did i
measure it hell no alright little splash
of vanilla we're going to switch to a
whisk and just whisk that up for
approximately well this is almost in
real time about 20-30 seconds until it
looks like that again so far no
electricity needed now to get your dry
ingredients ready we're going to add our
flour our salt in our baking soda not
powder baking soda to a bowl and we're
going to use a whisk to aerate it
basically that accomplishes the same
thing as sifting dump your flour dry mix
into your wet mixture into your egg and
butter mixture use your spatula again
until it's just barely combined it's
okay if there's a little bit of flour
here and there and then because amina
wanted a triple chocolate chip we have
milk chocolate dark chocolate and white
chocolate let me see one two three yes
that's triple chocolate
alright mix that until the chips are
integrated maybe 15 seconds and we're
ready to scoop I highly recommend you
buy one of these silicone baking mats
they are awesome if not you can use some
parchment paper or just a regular cookie
sheet I'm going to use
a sorbet scooper for this batch you're
going to get about 1416 cookies I'm just
going to make a dozen here those cook
for 10 minutes at 375 and when they come
out they look delicious now don't try to
put them on a rack yet let them cool a
little maybe 10 minutes then transfer
them to a wire rack to finish cooling
and you're done now let me tell you
something here I used a standard amount
of chips for this about 1 cup of chips
for that recipe and it's pretty chippy
it's got a good amount of chips in but
if you want a minha style triple
chocolate chips you got a double the
amount of chips I put in and then you
see you get like a solid mass basically
it's entirely chips and a little bit of
cookie that's how I mean it rolls from
what I've heard anyway congratulations
Amina and don't forget everybody else
you have to refer to it as the summer of
Amina and if I find out you're not
calling it the summer of Amina I will
come and find you and let's just say it
won't be pleasant and it will involve
three kinds of chocolate all right
anyway go check out the site all the
ingredients are there and as always
enjoy
